root_causes.description: AR exceptions are significantly high, indicating potential issues in data entry or reconciliation processes.
Duplicate bank records suggest inadequate process controls in transaction recording.

remediations.action: Implement enhanced validation checks in AR data entry and reconciliation processes.
remediations.success_criteria: Reduction in AR exceptions by 80% in the next financial period

remediations.action: Review and strengthen controls around bank transaction recording to prevent duplicates.
remediations.estimated_effort: 1 week for process review and control implementation
remediations.success_criteria: Elimination of duplicate bank records in subsequent reconciliations
